titles: A preparatory to the history natural & experimental written originally in Latine, by the Right Honourable Francis, Lord Verulam, Lord High Chancellour of England ; and now faithfully rendred into English, by a well-wisher to his Lordships writings.
author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
Well-wisher to his Lordships writings.
publisher: Printed by Sarah Griffing and Ben. Griffing, for William Lee ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.
